Package cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.controler

Class GameControllerStatic

java.lang.Object
cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.controler.GameControllerStatic
public class GameControllerStatic extends Object
This class is responsible for managing the game logic and data. It provides static methods that can be called from anywhere in the application.
